# New Relic SB SDK

New Relic SDK built by SoftButterfly to automate common New Relic One observability platform tasks

## Requirements

* Python 3.8.1 or higher
* `enforce-typing`
* `python-dotenv`
* `requests`
* `semver`
* `sgqlc`

## Install

Install from PyPI

```bash
pip install newrelic-sb-sdk
```
